TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit PSSecurityGlobalPermission extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Specifies global security permissions.

remarks.para: To see the settings for the global security permissions in Project Web App, choose Manage Users on the Server Settings page (http://ServerName/ProjectServerName/_layouts/pwa/admin/admin.aspx), select a user name to edit the user properties, and then expand the Global Permissions list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid AboutMicrosoftOfficeProjectServer
Public Shared ReadOnly AboutMicrosoftOfficeProjectServer As Guid

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The AboutMicrosoftOfficeProjectServer global permission has been deprecated. See the Microsoft Project 15 SDK for more information.")

Docs.summary: Allows a user to access the About Project Server page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid DownloadPwaOutlookAddIn
Public Shared ReadOnly DownloadPwaOutlookAddIn As Guid

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The DownloadPwaOutlookAddIn permission has been deprecated. See the Microsoft Project 2010 SDK for more information.")

Docs.summary: Obsolete.

remarks.para: In Project Server 2010, integration with Microsoft Outlook was done through Microsoft Exchange.

In Microsoft Office Project Server 2007, the DownloadPwaOutlookAddIn permission allows a user to download the Microsoft Office Outlook 2007 add-in for Project Web App, which is used for synchronizing assignment information with Outlook.
